description: This header file defines internal structures, constants, macros, and function prototypes related to the CCSP MTA Agent's SSP internal components, including component configuration, state management, logging, and memory usage. It appears to be part of a larger C/C project related to device management and component control.

methods.name: ssp_create_pnm
methods.description: Creates and initializes the PNM component using the provided configuration.

methods.name: ssp_engage_pnm
methods.description: Starts or engages the PNM component with the specified configuration.

methods.name: ssp_cancel_pnm
methods.description: Cancels or stops the PNM component operation based on the given configuration.

methods.name: ssp_LoadCosaPluginLibrary
methods.description: Loads the Cosa Plugin library for the component.

methods.name: MessageBusTaskSim
methods.description: Simulates or manages a message bus task for the component.

methods.name: ssp_PnmCCDmGetComponentState
methods.description: Returns the current state of the component.

methods.name: ssp_PnmCCDmGetLoggingEnabled
methods.description: Indicates whether logging is enabled for the component.

methods.name: ssp_PnmCCDmSetLoggingEnabled
methods.description: Enables or disables logging for the component.

methods.name: ssp_PnmCCDmGetMemMaxUsage
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum memory usage of the component.

methods.name: ssp_PnmCCDmGetMemMinUsage
methods.description: Retrieves the minimum memory usage of the component.

methods.name: ssp_PnmCCDmGetMemConsumed
methods.description: Retrieves the current memory consumption of the component.

methods.name: ssp_PnmCCDmApplyChanges
methods.description: Applies any configuration changes made to the component.
